DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research compare two different approach treat patient cervicogenic headache : non-thrust mobilization exercise versus thrust manipulation dry needling . Physical therapist commonly use technique treat cervicogenic headache . This study attempt find one treatment strategy effective .
DOC.brief_title: Spinal Manipulation Dry Needling Versus Conventional Physical Therapy Patients With Cervicogenic Headache
DOC.detailed_description: Patients cervicogenic headache randomize receive 1-2 treatment session per week 4 week ( 8 session total ) either : ( 1 ) Dry Needling HVLA thrust manipulation group , ( 2 ) Exercise non-thrust mobilization group
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosis cervicogenic headache define Cervicogenic Headache International Study Group criteria 2 . Headache frequency least one per week minimum 3 month 3 . Minimum pain score ( NPRS ) 2/10 minimum disability score ( NDI ) 10/50 1 . Presence follow atherosclerotic risk factor : hypertension , diabetes , heart disease , stroke , transient ischemic attack , peripheral vascular disease , smoking , hypercholesterolemia hyperlipidemia 2 . Red flag note patient 's Neck Medical Screening Questionnaire ( i.e . tumor , fracture , metabolic disease , RA , osteoporosis , history prolong steroid use , etc . 3 . History whiplash injury within last 6 week 4 . Diagnosis cervical stenosis 5 . Bilateral upper extremity symptom 6 . Evidence CNS involvement , include hyperreflexia , sensory disturbance hand , intrinsic muscle waste hand , unsteadiness walking , nystagmus , loss visual acuity , impaired sensation face , alter taste , presence pathological reflex ( i.e . positive Hoffman 's and/or Babinski reflex ) . 7 . Two positive neurologic sign consistent nerve root compression , include 2 following : 1 . Muscle weakness involve major muscle group upper extremity . 2 . Diminished UE deep tendon reflex biceps , brachioradialis , triceps superficial flexor 3 . Diminished absent sensation pinprick UE dermatome . 8 . Prior surgery neck thoracic spine 9 . Involvement litigation worker 's compensation regard neck pain and/or headaches 10 . PT chiropractic care treatment neck pain headache 3 month prior baseline exam . 11 . Any condition might contraindicate spinal manipulative therapy .
